summary: The daring exploits of a submarine commander whose mission is to chart the minefields in the waters of Japan during World War II.
cast: Ronald Reagan|Nancy Reagan|Arthur Franz|Robert Arthur|William Leslie|William 'Bill' Phillips|Harry Lauter|Michael Garth|Joe Turkel|Don Keefer|Frank Chase|Vinnie De Carlo|James Dobson|Thomas Browne Henry|Selmer Jackson|Maurice Manson|Chester W. Nimitz|Bing Russell
title: Hellcats of the Navy
